com.gui.widgets

Class ComponentConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gui.widgets.ComponentConnector

  • public class ComponentConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Connect an input-component to an output-function, so that whenever the input-data is changed, changes get written.
    Author:
    Gruppe 10
